strapiPost.title: NWA Naturals Announce 2021 Season Game Times
strapiPost.content:
Earlier this week, the Northwest Arkansas Naturals released game times for their 2021 season. Their first home game is on May 11 at 7:05pm against the Tulsa Drillers.

  • Natural State Rivals: The season opener, however, will take place on Tuesday, May 4, against the Arkansas Travelers at Dickey-Stephens Park in North Little Rock.

  • First pitch for most homes games on Tuesdays through Fridays will begin at 7:05pm, and most weekend games will start at 6:05pm on Saturdays, and 2:05pm on Sundays. Mondays are now off-days for the entire league.

  • Those who purchased season passes should receive "direct communication” from the organization with more information on COVID-19 policies in the very near future.

  • “We are finalizing our safety and fan admission protocols for the upcoming season with Major League Baseball, in conjunction with the ARDOH guidelines, and will soon share those options for you for the 2021 season," the organization said in a press release.

Additionally, next month, several of the Kansas City Royals will be using Arvest Ball Park as an "Alternative Training Site".

More information about the game times and Spring training can be found HERE
